title: ‘Blossom’ Creator, ‘Two and a Half Men’ Exec Producer Don Reo to Receive WGA’s Paddy Chayefsky Laurel Award for TV Writing
summary: Veteran TV writer and producer Don Reo, whose lengthy career includes everything from “MASH” and “The Golden Girls” to “Blossom,” “My Wife & Kids” and “Two and a Half Men,” will receive this year’s Paddy Chayefsky Laurel Award for Television Writing Achievement at the Writers Guild Awards. The hono…
